content: In the Finger exercise prompts, when it is stated that we should "assume we are given a variable," does this mean that our code does not need to define that variable and can run the program using that variable name? Or should we give that variable a value/ define it if we want to use it in a program? Also, is this related to the EOF error that I keep getting, even when my program runs find in my IDE?
subject: Finger Exercise & Error

content: Your code does not need to define that variable and can run the program using that variable name. Don't ask for input from the user.
